Yeah, organic chars are allowed. Why wouldn't they be?

::Ramulus/Zardus::

Ramulus nods, continuing to walk. "From what the scans reported, they have a 
large bot on their side. They're also a gestalt. Other than that, I'm not 
sure. Their mind controll weapon seems to be the biggest threat. This is a 
hostage negotiation, though. Only me and Lunarpine will be seen unless they 
open fire. Then we can retaliate."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus carefully removes Squizzy's main proccessor as she asks her question.

"The new proccessor will hopefully reset her internal functions. Whatever 
security programms are in there should be cleared, and then reprogramming can 
take place."

He remembers that Battera had a bot in the CR chambers, activating his 
comm-link.

"Unitron," he says into it. Unitron had appeared fairly smart in the halls, 
he would be the most likely of the Alliance members to be able to reprogramm 
a bot, "There's a bot waiting to be reprogrammed. He's in the CR chambers, 
can you bring him to the lab?"

Zardus then picks up Soundwave's main proccessor, attempting to install it 
into Squizzy.
